-e ---
---
The [Latvian](Latvian) languages are renowned among linguists for preserving some features of [PIE](PIE) especially well.  

Some forms of Egyptian also seem closer to [Latvian](Latvian) than other languages:  

ğ“‹´ ğ“ ğ“ ğ“® ğ“‚»||run|skriet@LAT+++ spurt/scourt/escort courant scout (courier) â‡” Schritteğ“‚»  

while the word beard 'ğ“ğ“ƒ€ğ“Šƒğ“…±ğ“ğ“¸' contains the letters _b_ğ“…±d for beard, the other letters so far were inexplicable.  
The situation looks much less dire in Latgalian:

These may be puns, dialectic readings, or just different words with the same 'root' letters.  

Also see [https://github.com/pannous/hieros/tree/master/dicts/swadesh/BALTIC.csv](https://github.com/pannous/hieros/tree/master/dicts/swadesh/BALTIC.csv)
